channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Grand Canyon hotels on South Rim reopening after water pipeline repaired

item.title: Taekwondo instructor learns fate for killing 7-year-old student, parents
item.description: After killing the boy and his mother, he took her Apple watch and drove her BMW to the family home where he stabbed the boy's father to death.
